snippet: Mohamed Nasheed, the former president who was the first to be democratically elected in the island nation, received 45 percent of the vote and now faces a runoff with Yaamin Abdul Qayyoom.
lead_paragraph: Mohamed Nasheed, the former president who was the first to be democratically elected in the island nation, received 45 percent of the vote and now faces a runoff with Yaamin Abdul Qayyoom.

headline.main: Ex-President of Maldives Faces Runoff Election
headline.print_headline: Ex-President of Maldives Faces Runoff Election
